events.name: Cozy Candlelit Dinner
events.description: An intimate evening with homemade Italian cuisine, soft jazz, and warm candlelight ambiance.

foodDetails.name: Pasta Carbonara & Tiramisu
foodDetails.ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, parmesan, black pepper, mascarpone, espresso, ladyfingers
foodDetails.additionalFoodItems: Red wine, sparkling water, fresh bread

events.name: Japanese Sushi Masterclass
events.description: Learn to roll sushi from a trained chef while enjoying sake and authentic Japanese appetizers.

foodDetails.name: Sushi & Sashimi Platter
foodDetails.ingredients: Sushi rice, nori, salmon, tuna, avocado, cucumber, wasabi, pickled ginger, soy sauce
foodDetails.additionalFoodItems: Sake, green tea, miso soup, edamame

events.name: Summer Garden BBQ Party
events.description: Outdoor grilling with craft beers, lawn games, and live acoustic music in a beautiful backyard.

foodDetails.name: BBQ Grill Selection
foodDetails.ingredients: Beef burgers, chicken wings, pork ribs, corn on the cob, coleslaw, potato salad
foodDetails.additionalFoodItems: Craft beers, homemade lemonade, watermelon slices

events.name: Vegan Thai Cooking Night
events.description: Explore plant-based Thai cuisine with fresh herbs, coconut milk curries, and aromatic rice.

foodDetails.name: Thai Green Curry & Pad Thai
foodDetails.ingredients: Tofu, coconut milk, Thai basil, lemongrass, galangal, rice noodles, vegetables, peanuts
foodDetails.additionalFoodItems: Thai iced tea, mango sticky rice, spring rolls

events.name: French Wine & Cheese Tasting
events.description: Sample artisan cheeses paired with premium French wines in an elegant setting.

foodDetails.name: Artisan Cheese Board
foodDetails.ingredients: Brie, camembert, roquefort, gruyère, chèvre, fresh grapes, walnuts, honey, baguette
foodDetails.additionalFoodItems: Bordeaux red, Burgundy white, Champagne, charcuterie

events.name: Mexican Taco Tuesday Fiesta
events.description: Build your own tacos with authentic fillings, fresh salsas, and margaritas!

foodDetails.name: Taco Bar Spread
foodDetails.ingredients: Corn tortillas, carnitas, grilled chicken, black beans, pico de gallo, guacamole, cheese
foodDetails.additionalFoodItems: Margaritas, Mexican beer, churros with chocolate sauce

events.name: Mediterranean Mezze Evening
events.description: A spread of hummus, falafel, grilled halloumi, and fresh pita under the stars.

foodDetails.name: Mezze Platter
foodDetails.ingredients: Hummus, baba ganoush, falafel, halloumi, tabbouleh, olives, pickled vegetables, pita bread
foodDetails.additionalFoodItems: Ouzo, retsina wine, baklava, Turkish coffee

events.name: Indian Curry Night
events.description: Authentic North Indian curries with naan bread, fragrant rice, and traditional chai.

foodDetails.name: Curry Feast
foodDetails.ingredients: Chicken tikka masala, lamb rogan josh, dal makhani, basmati rice, naan, raita, mango chutney
